4yp.title: Undergraduate Research Projects
4yp.description: Research projects carried out by final year Computer Engineering students as part of coursework

3yp.title: Cyber-Physical Systems Projects
3yp.description: Cyber-Physical Systems designed and implemented by 3rd year Computer Engineering Students as part of coursework. These projects contain modern embedded hardware and software, cloud-deployed web back-end/front-end software and modern networking and communication for integration

co227.title: Software Systems Projects
co227.description: Software systems designed and developed by second year Computer Engineering Students as part of coursework

co226.title: Database Projects (CO226)
co226.description: This section contains projects conducted as a partial requirement to complete the course CO226 - Database Systems. Usually, these projects are conducted by groups of 3 students. The course focuses on database systems and students are required to develop a database management system for the project

co326.title: Industrial Automation Projects (CO326)
co326.description: This section contains projects conducted as a partial requirement to complete the course CO326. The timeline for the project is semester 6 (second semester of the third year) of the undergraduate. The main objective of this is to give students a hand on experience of Industrial Communication Networks.

co328.title: Software Engineering Projects (CO328)
co328.description: This section contains projects conducted as a partial requirement to complete the course CO328 - Software Engineering. Usually, these projects are conducted by groups of 3 students. The course focus on using software architectures and software project management experience.

co543.title: Image Processing Projects (CO543)
co543.description: This section contains projects conducted as a partial requirement to complete the course CO543 - Image Processing

co542.title: Neural Networks Projects (CO542)
co542.description: This section contains projects conducted as a partial requirement to complete the course CO542 - Neural Networks and Fuzzy Systems

co502.title: Advanced Computer Architecture (CO502)
co502.description: This section contains projects conducted as a partial requirement to complete the course CO502 - Advanced Computer Architecture. The scope includes HDL implementations of modern computer processors based on ISAs such as RISC-V, caching, memory and assemblers.
